name: Ferrous Shard
description: Raw metallic fragment, essential for early construction.

name: Carbon Dust
description: Pulverized organic residue, used as fuel or synthesizer input.

name: Silica Crystal
description: Crystalline sand, vital for glass and optics fabrication.

name: Plasma Residue
description: Solidified ion gas, emits faint radiation.

name: Void Ore
description: Dark mineral that absorbs light, source of exotic alloys.

name: Nanofiber Weave
description: Flexible high-strength fabric for suits and ship interiors.

name: Quantum Coil
description: Precision-wound energy core stabilizer.

name: Phase Regulator
description: Balances energy flow in unstable reactors.

name: Bio-Circuit
description: Organic logic chip that reacts to neural patterns.

name: Holo-Matrix
description: Stores 3D projections and holographic data.

name: Auto-Miner Drone
description: Deployable drone that extracts nearby minerals automatically.

name: Data Spike
description: Hacking spike used to override security terminals.

name: Nutrient Gel Pack
description: Restores focus and stamina; mildly sweet taste.

name: Neural Booster
description: Temporarily enhances analytical performance.

name: Shield Battery
description: Instantly recharges personal energy shields.

name: Ancient Datacube
description: Encrypted relic containing forgotten colony logs.

name: Obsidian Relic
description: Vibrates faintly when anomalies are near.

name: Encoded Signal Log
description: Intermittent transmission pointing to unknown coordinates.

name: Stellar Map Fragment
description: Fragmented data map showing uncharted sectors.

name: Credits
description: Standard galactic trade currency.
